attributes.action: IMMEDIATELY RE-DESIGN THE 2012 OLYMPICS LOGO TO INCLUDE BRITISH COLOURS AND REPRESENT OUR CONTEMPORARY NATION AS IT IS IN THE 21ST CENTURY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please Re-Design the appalling 2012 Olympics logo.  Apart from the flashing images that can cause those sensitive to 'strobing' to become unwell, there are none of our British Colours represented within the logo.  We are a multicultural nation with millions of talented contemporary artists, please use someone who can represent us as we are today, not re-gurgitate a look that stems from the 1980's childrens television!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
